aboutQuip: After a fruitful 18-year career as a professional chef, I made the big switch to tech. Now I'm on the hunt for quality programming experience wherever I can get it.
aboutCaptionLn1: A decidedly atypical profile indeed, but I am insatiably curious, meticulous, and passionate about clean, scalable code.
aboutCaptionLn2: Even better, I come equipped with soft skills and an attention to detail that only experience can provide. Rigour, initiative, and perseverance are qualities which continue to define me in both professional and personal endeavors.
checkBack: Check back often... this is a constant work in progress.
cvHeader: Determined, rigorous, and passionate professional. Vastly experienced in autonomous and collaborative execution of complex tasks requiring an elevated degree of analysis, critical thinking, and adaptability. Insatiable apprentice on an eternal quest to master his craft, no matter the challenge.
contactQuip: Send me a message if you have any questions, or just want to chat.
homeCaptionLn1: Developer and former chef in Paris, FR. serving up more fresh code than fine foods these days.
